remarks: An associative property between group multiple and ring multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
mulgass2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mulgass2.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
mulgass2.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mulgass2 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( N e. ZZ /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( ( N .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( N .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) $.
